title: Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: The Official Video Game + Multiplayer
body:
Olympic Games Tokyo 2020: The Official Video Game + Multiplayer


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Sports, 3D
Company: SEGA
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI12
Original Size: 11.8 GB
Repack Size: from 4.3 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Olympic_Games_Tokyo_2020_The_Official_Video_Game-FLT ISO release: flt-olympic_games_tokyo_2020_the_official_video_game.iso (12,689,262,592 bytes)
  • Alternative Goldberg crack/emulator is available in NoDVD folder after installation, allowing multiplayer via private lobbies
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of additional localizations (English is included by default)
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 11.8 to 4.3~7.1 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes from 4 minutes (8-threads CPU + SSD, no optional languages) up to 20 minutes (4-threads CPU + HDD, all languages)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 13.8 GB (27.5 GB during installation)
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

The Olympic Games are back, and this time it’s your chance for glory! Whether you play with friends, family, or go for gold on the global leaderboards, this is a party game that anyone can pick up and enjoy!

Prepare to unleash the competitor within as you create your athlete, customize their skills and pick the perfect costume. Why settle for standard sportswear when you can take centre stage as a pirate, astronaut or cowboy?

Choose between 18 fun-fueled sporting events—from Tennis and Football to the 100m, Basketball and Boxing—there’s always a record to beat and a score to settle.

Going for gold has never been this much fun!

You can skip downloading of additional localizations (English is included by default). Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-additional-locales.bin [REQUIRED for all additional localizations)
  • fg-optional-brazilian.bin
  • fg-optional-chinese.bin
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-korean.bin
  • fg-optional-polish.bin
  • fg-optional-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish voiceovers – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-additional-locales.bin, fg-optional-spanish.bin & all main files (01-05).
